verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1919>earthly<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> this <S%G4636>tabernacle<s%> were <S%G2647>dissolved<s%>, we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3619>building<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, a <S%G3614>house<s%> not made with <S%G886>hands<s%>, <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%>.

<S%G1063%G99999>For<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> we <S%G4727>groan<s%>, earnestly <S%G1971>desiring<s%> to be <S%G1902>clothed<s%> with <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3613>house<s%> which is <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>:
<S%G1489>If<s%> so be <S%G2532>that<s%> being <S%G1746>clothed<s%> we <S%G2147>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%>.

<S%G1063%G99999>For<s%> we that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> this <S%G4636>tabernacle<s%> do <S%G4727>groan<s%>, being <S%G916>burdened<s%>: <S%G2309>not<s%> <S%G1894>for<s%> <S%G3756>that<s%> we <S%G1562>would<s%> be <S%G235>unclothed<s%>, <S%G1902>but<s%> <S%G2443>clothed<s%>, <S%G2666>that<s%> <S%G5259>mortality<s%> might be swallowed <S%G2222>up<s%> by <S%G2222>life<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> has <S%G2716>done<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5124>thing<s%> is <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> the <S%G728>earnest<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> we are <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2292>confident<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G2532>while<s%> we are at <S%G1736>home<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%>, we are <S%G1553>absent<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>:

We are <S%G2292>confident<s%>, I <S%G2532>say<s%>, and <S%G2106>willing<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> to be <S%G1553>absent<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G1736>present<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> we <S%G5389>labor<s%>, <S%G2532>that<s%>, <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G1736>present<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1553>absent<s%>, we may <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2101>accepted<s%> by <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5319>appear<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> every <S%G1538>one<s%> may <S%G2865>receive<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> done <S%G1223>in<s%> his <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G4314>according<s%> to <S%G3739>that<s%> he has <S%G4238>done<s%>, <S%G1535>whether<s%> it be <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2556>bad<s%>.

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G5401>terror<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, we <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> we are made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> I <S%G1679>trust<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4893>consciences<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G4921>commend<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> to <S%G2745>glory<s%> on <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G5228>behalf<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G2192>have<s%> something <S%G4314>to<s%> answer <S%G3588>them<s%> which <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4383>appearance<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G2588>heart<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> we are beside <S%G1839>ourselves<s%>, it is to <S%G2316>God<s%>: or <S%G1535>whether<s%> we are <S%G4993>sober<s%>, it is for your <S%G5213>cause<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4912>constrains<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>; <S%G5124>because<s%> we thus <S%G2919>judge<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G599>dying<s%>, <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G599>died<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> that he <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> which <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2198>should<s%> not <S%G3371>henceforth<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> unto <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> unto <S%G3588>him<s%> which <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> rose <S%G1453>again<s%>.

<S%G5620%G99999%G99999>Therefore<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>: <S%G1161>Yes<s%>, <S%G1487%G99999>though<s%> we have <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1097>we<s%> know him no <S%G3765>more<s%>.

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, he is a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2937>creature<s%>: old <S%G744>things<s%> have passed <S%G3928>away<s%>; <S%G2400>behold<s%>, all <S%G3956>things<s%> have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> has <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation<s%>;

To <S%G5613>know<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2644>reconciling<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> unto <S%G1438>himself<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3049>imputing<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3900>trespasses<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> has <S%G5087>committed<s%> <S%G1722>unto<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation<s%>.

Now <S%G3767>then<s%> we are <S%G4243>ambassadors<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> did <S%G3870>beg<s%> you <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>: we <S%G1189>beg<s%> you <S%G5228>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s place, be <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> he has made <S%G4160>him<s%> to be <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, who <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> might be <S%G1096>made<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
